participant_1.name: Alex Johnson
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, loves the outdoors and enjoys new challenges.
participant_1.background: I live in Colorado. I like to go hiking in the spring. My favorite activity is rock climbing. I am a mechanical engineer.

participant_2.name: Jamie Smith
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and playful, enjoys spending time with pets and has a love for cars.
participant_2.background: My favorite color is grey. I am terrified of scorpions. I have a German Shepherd named Barnaby. My father drove a car for NASCAR. I'm employed by the US Postal Service.
